subTitle: Ask us anything about Lumiro and building your landing page, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What is included in the Basic plan?
faqs.answer: The Basic plan includes 500 orders per month, essential landing page features, standard support, and basic customization options. It's perfect for small businesses looking to establish their online presence with a professional landing page template.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade from Basic to Regular or Advance plan?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to a higher plan at any time to access more orders per month, advanced features, priority support, and enhanced customization options. Contact our support team for a seamless transition and we'll help you migrate your existing setup.

faqs.question: How customizable is the Lumiro landing page template?
faqs.answer: Lumiro offers extensive customization options. The Basic plan includes basic customization, while Regular and Advance plans provide full customization and unlimited customization respectively. You can modify colors, fonts, layouts, content, and integrate your branding to match your business identity perfectly.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support can I expect?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive dedicated email support. With the Basic plan, you'll receive our standard support. The Regular plan upgrades you to priority support, and the Advance plan includes 24/7 priority support with faster response times and specialized assistance for your landing page needs.

faqs.question: How quickly can I get my landing page up and running?
faqs.answer: With Lumiro's ready-to-use template and pre-built components, you can have your landing page live in just a few hours. The setup process is straightforward, and our documentation guides you through every step. Most users report having their landing page operational within a day.

faqs.question: Does Lumiro offer services for enterprise-level businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer Enterprise Solutions designed for larger companies requiring comprehensive landing page services. We provide consultation, custom development, advanced integrations, dedicated support, and tailored solutions for substantial business needs. Contact us for a customized quote.
